            <string language="en">Thermometers for different aims</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </description>
          <description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Termómetros para diversas punterías</string>
          </description>

Minimum-Maximum thermo Meßinstrument,</string>

          <keyword>

thermo de minimum-maximum,</string>

do mínimo-máximo,</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el contador thermo, fever contador thermo, contador 
thermo del mi'nimo-ma'ximo,</string>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
